header.title: AsciiArtSVGGenerator in Cocoon
header.abstract: This document describes the AsciiArtSVGGenerator of Cocoon.

tr.td: The AsciiArtSVGGenerator component is used to serve ascii art text as SVGserve data.

s1.title: Description
s1.p: The AsciiArtSVGGenerator reads a plain ascii text document and generates SVG/XML SAX events.

s1.title: Usage
s1.p: The AsciiArtSVGGenerator can be used to serve figural information in a quick, and simple way.
The following snippet represents an ascii art which can be served by AsciiArtSVGGenerator
Storing this as image/asciiart/mail.txt, and using the matching snippet below, the mail ascii art can get embedded in your document as

s2.title: Sitemap pipeline examples
s2.p: The snippet below matches URI of the format image/asciiart/*.png, and serves them from ascii art files from the directory resources/asciiart/*.txt.
s2.source: <map:match pattern="image/asciiart/*.png"> <map:generate type="asciiart-svg" src="resources/asciiart/{1}.txt"> <!-- option sitemap parameters --> </map:generate> <map:serialize type="svg2png"/> </map:match>

s2.title: Configuration
s2.p: The AsciiArtGenerator has no configurational options.

s2.title: Setup
s2.p: Setting up the AsciiArtGenerator is simply specifying the plain ascii text source.

s2.title: Effect on Object Model and Sitemap Parameters
s2.p: The AsciiArtGenerator has no side effects on the objectModel, or other sitemap parameters.

s1.title: Bugs/Caveats
s1.p: The AsciiArtGenerator is a quick shot, and does not handle all characters visually consistently.
